sn51.5:1.1: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va iddhipadesam abhinipphadesum sabbe te catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.5:1.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va iddhipadesam abhinipphadessanti sabbe te catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.5:1.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va iddhipadesam abhinipphadenti sabbe te catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.5:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.5:2.6: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va iddhipadesam abhinipphadesum, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.5:2.7: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va iddhipadesam abhinipphadessanti, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.5:2.8: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va iddhipadesam abhinipphadenti, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta”ti.
